# Quarterstaff
## Overview
A quarterstaff is a simple piece of wood, about 5 feet in length.


-tx-
| **Simple Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Two-Handed Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** | ** Special** |
| | Quarterstaff | — | 1d4/1d4 | 1d6/1d6 | x2 | — | 4lbs. | B | — |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 148
